decks.notes: The main concept of this UR Control deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells and removing threats with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Flame of Anor. It also utilizes cards like Snapcaster Mage and Crackling Drake for card advantage and pressure. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, removal, and card draw to maintain control over the game while eventually closing out the game with efficient threats. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and maximize consistency in casting spells.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on using a combination of hand disruption, removal spells, and aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also deploying efficient threats such as Grief and Boggart Trawler. Additionally, the deck has ways to regain life and generate card advantage with cards like Revitalizing Repast and Not Dead After All. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain board control to secure a swift victory.

This deck revolves around assembling a powerful combo utilizing cards like The One Ring, Omniscience, and Seed of Hope. By utilizing tutor cards like Traverse the Ulvenwald and Utopia Sprawl, the deck aims to quickly set up its combo pieces. Other cards like Malevolent Rumble and Seasoned Pyromancer help control the board and generate value. Karn, the Great Creator serves as a versatile threat and toolbox. The deck also includes Griselbrand for additional card draw and Boseiju, Who Endures to protect important combo pieces. Overall, the deck focuses on assembling its combo efficiently while maintaining board control and card advantage.
